article.headline: Austin Peay 71, Samford 60
article.story: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) -- Anthony Davis scored a game-high 19 points to lead Austin Peay to a 71-60 victory over Samford on Tuesday night in the first round of the Ohio Valley Conference tournament. The Governors (12-8, 10-7) advanced to the semifinals, where they will face the Golden Eagles (18-10) on Friday in Nashville. Maurice Hampton added 18 points for the Governors. Zac Schlader had 12 points and a game-high eight rebounds. The Governors led 32-28 at halftime, but Samford (15-13, 10-7) grabbed the lead three times in the second half. The Governors pulled ahead on a 3-pointer by Maurice Hampton with 4:28 left on the clock and never trailed again, nabbing their biggest lead of 14 points with 20 seconds left on the clock. J. Robert Merrit scored a 3-pointer for the Bulldogs with 14 seconds left to play to seal the final score at 71-60. Merritt led Samford with 19 points and shot 3-of-10 from 3-point range. Randall Gulina added 13 points and Bryan Boerjan had 11. Austin Peay shot 50.0 percent from the field and Samford shot 45.2 percent.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
